statements.statement:
select * from TT_PHACDO_CHUKY_DUOC
BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
order by CHUKY_DUOC_ID

select * from TT_PHACDO_CHUKY_DUOC where TT_PHACDO_CHUKY_DUOC.CHUKY_DUOC_ID = $CHUKY_DUOC_ID$
BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
order by CHUKY_DUOC_ID
delete from TT_PHACDO_CHUKY_DUOC where CHUKY_DUOC_ID in (SELECT * FROM DBO.SPLIT('$CHUKY_DUOC_ID$',', '))

select * from LST_DICTIONARY where DICTIONARY_TYPE_CODE = 'DanhGiaPhacDo'
BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'

declare @JSONDATA nvarchar(max) = N'$JSON_ADDPHA$'
insert into TT_PHACDO_CHUKY_DUOC SELECT * FROM OPENJSON(@JSONDATA) WITH ( CHUKY_ID int , PHACDO_ID int , PHIENBAN_ID int , DUOC_ID int , HOATCHAT_ID int , HAMLUONG nvarchar(100) , SOLUONG numeric(25,4) , SONGAY int , SOLANTRENNGAY int , SOLUONGTRENLAN numeric(25,4) , SOLUONG_BUOISANG numeric(25,4) , SOLUONG_BUOITRUA numeric(25,4) , SOLUONG_BUOICHIEU numeric(25,4) , SOLUONG_BUOITOI numeric(25,4) , DUONGDUNG_ID int , GHICHU nvarchar(250) , BENHVIEN_ID varchar(10) , NGAYTAO datetime , NGUOITAO_ID int , NGAYCAPNHAT datetime , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID int )
